name: Combat Expertise
description: You can increase your defense at the expense of your accuracy.
benefit: You can choose to take a –1 penalty on melee attack rolls and combat maneuver checks to gain a +1 dodge bonus to your Armor Class. When your base attack bonus reaches +4, and every +4 thereafter, the penalty increases by –1 and the dodge bonus increases by +1. You can only choose to use this feat when you declare that you are making an attack or a full-attack action with a melee weapon. The effects of this feat last until your next turn.
staminaText: You can select this feat even if you don’t meet the ability score prerequisite (Intelligence 13). You gain the benefit of this feat only as long as you have at least 1 stamina point in your stamina pool. If you spend stamina points to raise an attack roll using the Combat Stamina feat’s benefits, ignore an amount of your Combat Expertise penalty equal to the number of stamina points you spent.
mythicDescription: You can dart out of the way of attacks with skill and defiance.
mythicBenefit: Whenever you use Combat Expertise, you gain an additional +2 dodge bonus to your Armor Class. You can expend one use of mythic power to negate the penalties on melee attack rolls and combat maneuver checks caused by using Combat Expertise for 1 minute.
description_zh: 以精准度的代价获得防御的提升。
benefit_zh: 你可以选择用近战攻击和战技检定的-1减值来换取AC的+1闪避加值。每当BAB+4，攻击减值会再-1，AC加值也会再+1。你只能在以近战武器进行攻击或全力攻击时，才能选择使用这个专长；专长效果持续到你下轮开始。
